name: Overgrowth - GMTK Game Jam 2020
description:
The trees in the old wood defend their secrets with a little help from you in this unusual tower defender. Click to corral their enemies within striking distance. 

Created in 48 hours (with sleeps!) for GMTK Game Jam 2020 by Team Special Lemons (Dan Crist & Erin Mehlos). Unfortunately we didn't have time to implement the additional units and maps planned and begun and this "tutorial" level is all there is for now! Additionally there's a known issue where the pinecone bomb projectiles don't display. Might be fun to revisit one day! Thanks for playing!

Includes music by J. Syreus Bach and Scott Holmes.
